title: Palm Beach Gardens Financial Advisor Peter Blatt teaches Adult Education Class “Retirement Planning Today” at Palm Beach State College Eissey Campus
text:
Peter Blatt, an investment advisor and president and founder of Blatt Financial Group in Palm Beach Gardens, recently taught a course on Retirement Planning for people age 50-70 that are at or near retirement through Palm Beach State College’s Corporate and Continuing Education division. Mr. Blatt holds the only license in Central to Northern Palm Beach County to instruct this course through The Financial Educators Network ( http://www.feninc.com .) The course, which combines life planning and retirement planning concepts, is a 6-hour course done in 2 sessions. The courses were held Thursdays October 1st & 8th and Tuesdays October 6th & 13th. This was Mr. Blatt’s fourth time teaching this course. Mr. Blatt will be teaching Retirement Planning Today in early 2016. In addition, Mr. Blatt created a course “Investment Today: Risk Reduction and Understanding Wall Street” and will begin teaching that in early 2016 as well.
About Blatt Financial Group
Blatt Financial Group is a Financial Planning firm affiliated with Blatt Legal, PLC, an Estate Planning Law firm. Blatt Financial Group provides wealth management services as well as comprehensive retirement and estate planning to individuals and families throughout Palm Beach County and surrounding areas. Founded in 2002 by Peter Blatt, Blatt Financial Group is conveniently located in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida. For more information on Blatt Financial Group, please call (561) 625-0900 or visit BlattFG.com.
